name: What Would You Do As a Nigerian Tribal Chief
name_original: What Would You Do As a Nigerian Tribal Chief
description:
Your father has been killed in a assassination attack on your life, trying to stay alive and avenge your father the best way you can you make life making the decisions that most people wouldn't even dream of making. Man or Woman doesn't matter, because in this computer game YOU ARE THE CHARACTER! In this game isn't only fueled by your decisions but also by your pure imagination and my creative storytelling!

Not only will you have fun but and be entertained but you will also be educated about Yoruba culture while playing! I have created the first of its kind an Cause and Effect (input and output) Computer Game. Well Input and Output or Cause and Effect games genre is something a came up with one day in the middle of creating one of my Computer games. Since I think I could not title the game a text adventure game since in the game it will pop up an image to show an example of what the environment also at the time want to show my programming knowledge and experience in the computer programming language looks like I have been getting better since first learning. And I could not find anything else to classify this Text-Based Historical Fiction Computer Game so I classify it my self to part of my game play mechanic Input and Output.

Inspired by the book ROOTS by Alex Haley about A mans struggle through life and him over coming the one of the most horrific times in human history with his fellow brothers and sisters, comes the best game ever and the 1st of its kind 'What Would You Do As a Nigerian Tribal Chief'.

Did I mention how excited I am that I have completed my first game! Not to forget I am selling EULA Copies.

This game is compatible with all versions of Windows Operating System (Windows 95, Windows NT 4.0, Windows 98, Windows 2000, Windows ME, Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1 and Windows 10)
